Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: I missed all the daily free Champagne at 5 30 in the lobby My fault as I was always out touring Paris at that time You Will spend very little time in the Hotel Really I have nothing bad to say about this hotel having spent 4 great days there
Positive_Review: Location Location Location Minutes from Notre Dame and Lourve walking Metro RER Saint Micheal Notre Dame Station so handy for CDG airport Versailles Eiffel Tower Catacombs etc Beside the Latin Quarter with HUGE selection of cafe s restaurants etc I could go on and on but the Hotel is in a fantastic location The Metro station with a PARIS VISIT PASS makes traveling all over the city so convenient The hotel is clean service was good and the staff were genuinely very helpful and friendly They give you a complimentary mobile WiFi hotspot on checking in that works all over Paris OMG what a genius idea I was connected the whole time while touring Paris I did not avail of the hotel breakfast 15 as seriously you are in Paris every 10 feet of walking you seem to pass a restaurant or cafe always serving food and drink what ever your takes your fancy There is a Monoprix store around the corner you can buy beer wine or any of your usual essentials very handy

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Nearly nonexistent breakfast just 1 small table of stuff no selection they don t even make omelette Only staff at the reception speaks good English others nearly none Soundproofing is nonexistent noise in the corridor and nearby rooms made sleeping difficult Water pressure in shower was very low 4th floor ventilation is shower and toilet insufficient
Positive_Review: Coffee great champagne and sweets served for free in the evening is nice too interior on the reception floor is nice considering limited space reception staff was very helpful

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: The doublebed is a little bit too small for my daughter and I I thought it risky that there was no gripp which helps to get out from the bathtub
Positive_Review: Champagne happy hour everyday Free drinks in the fridge Free Portable Wifi Friendly and helpful hotel staff

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: The only problem I found was that the rooms where rather small We had rented a room with three beds and it was small However the air conditioner was great which was a surprise for us
Positive_Review: Breakfast was great

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Everyone at the hotel was friendly and helpful We loved the location and conveniently close to public transport Notre Dame Pantheon Luxemborg Gardens and the Metro Rooms were clean and beds comfortable No complaints at all

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Room was too hot with no way to cool down Open window was very noisy
Positive_Review: Very convenient location Free WiFi was a requirement although it was intermittent Staff were very helpful Champagne happy hour was a bonus

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: 1 We ordered a De Lux Room and received a Standard Room but i fugured it out and they changed us to a De Lux 2 No heater in the room but they changed us for another room 3 no heater in the bathroom and no electric plug
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Space around the sink was too narrow for a convenient shaving and cleaning Lift was very slow
Positive_Review: Excellent location nice area and easy connections to the airports Excellent breakfast

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: The room was a bit old
Positive_Review: Very good location excellent staff champagne happy hours and free coffee with macaroons all day long Nice view from the window

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We were very happy with the hotel Excellent hotel Perfect location Latin Quarter of Paris Friendly staff Free high quality expresso coffee and macaroons 24 7

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Room was very small and unfortunately right over busy main road so extremely noisy Ask for a rear room
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly and helpful Breakfast was very good Free coffee in foyer was a lovely touch Very close to RER Metro and bus links Great restaurants within 5 min walk

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: It says it s a 4 star hotel but it feels more like a 2 3 stars The rooms are tiny the to had no brush trash can and no isolation cold and loud all the time The shower door didn t fit so I couldn t close it There was only a small plastic shower gel The rooms were extremely loud to the point we thought people were trying to enter our room when guests would go back to the rooms next door The bed and overall space was very small
Positive_Review: Delicious sweets at the entrance Staff was friendly

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful and excellent The hotel location was near all the tourist attractions shops and restaurants All I can say it was an amazing stay and the hotel felt like home

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Breakfast was ok nothing Special The rooms was heated with two Heatimng Station but still cold espicially in the bath
Positive_Review: Its very close to the Saint Michel Station and next to a lot of Restaurants Around the Corner is Monoprix where you can by some groceries and Drinks Very friendly staff and nice cute Hotek

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Breakfast was a little pricey and it would have been more convenient to not have a separate toilet in the room However room was nice and cosy well equipped and very clean
Positive_Review: A small comfortable friendly hotel is in a great location to explore this wonderful city Nice touches Inc free mini bar orange juice champagne and little delicontasant cakes avaliable in the reception area

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: The flowers decoration in the bedroom was a bit too much and consuming much space in the room
Positive_Review: This is our second stay after we got back from Lourdes Finally we got a nice smaller bedroom with a bigger bathroom and no longer on the 6th floor The main elevator was finally fixed We got all out luggage ready in our new room The male front desk staff was treating me nicely and friendly that time The free soft drinks in the mini bar were finally 6 items as it was told in the email

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: The main elevator was out of service We had to use the very small elevator We stayed on level 6 and we had to climb up the stairs due to the back up elevator only served to the 5th floor In the email we were informed that we would be given 6 free soft drinks but we got only 3 items instead until my first check out One of the male staff needed to be more friendly and he was a bit defensive when I asked him politely about my inconvenience His answer was ok but the way he answered was not ok
Positive_Review: This is my first stay I love the spaciousness coziness and cleanness of the room nice bathroom the refreshments at the lobby was very entertaining very good location

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Better cleaning housekeeping of rooms in the day Housekeeping not making loud vacuum cleaning noise at 9 10 am while guests in bed waking us up Start later Provide actual double beds instead of joining together two single beds which are very uncomfortable due to gap in middle For the price we paid over 110 per night a simple breakfast coffee croissant etc can be included in price It s a small thing that makes guests feel warm and welcome and costs you next to nothing in real terms
Positive_Review: Very central location close to metro and attractions

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent location for restaurants and Parisians sites Great access to metro and CDG airport Nice touch providing a complimentary glass of champagne each day of the stay

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: There was mildew around bathtub
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and helpful Breakfast had good variety and was plentiful Hotel location was good Enjoyed having champagne every afternoon at 5 00pm Always had macarons at front desk for guests

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: very small room in spite of paying 430 euro per night wi fi is very poor you have to reconnect every almost an hour very poor quality of territories in the bathroom
Positive_Review: location Nesperesso coffee machine in the reception

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: There are some rooms that don t have window Actually there is but you can see only emergency stairs and wall
Positive_Review: Nice location for both of business and sightseeing Close from metro station restaurants grocery stores and huge park Staff can speak English fluently You should ask them where to eat because there are too many restaurants around there I like free macaroons free sparkling wine and yummy break fast

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Decor is starting to look a little tired Rooms looked nice but carpets looking well worn and paintwork faded
Positive_Review: The complimentary champagne was a really special touch as was the nespresso These details will stick in my mind and win my repeat business

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Room was cleaned so well The curtains pulled back The beds were made nicely with cookies on the turned down sheets The air conditioning was a dream The bathroom had a great tub and shower combo and though small was a top flight bathroom The staff was extremely helpful in every way very gracious and friendly They served a delicious champagne every late afternoon with nibbles Very close to Luxembourg Notre Dame and many wonderful restaurants especially heading west on Ecole and intercepting Saint Germaine and everything in the edges of 6 and 7 A further walk to the Louvre and D Orsay but easy and beautiful

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: The breakfast was at basement in a very small dark room and unfortunately was not serve for a person who paid about 215 per day was unacceptable
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Rooms were way too small The head board area had a small shelf that we hit with our head while getting in and out of bed
Positive_Review: Wine and cookies at the reception

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Everything The location and ease of travel in and around Paris Free nibbles and champagne each day between 5 and 8 o clock was a lovely touch too

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: We had 2 rooms for our group Tiny but that s Paris In 1 room the noisy outdated airco froze into a block of ice and then dripped all over our things soaking them In the other the tiny sink was blocked and even after the night receptionist tried to plunger it never drained properly Pictures on web a bit deceptive cozy looking old Bathrooms had been renewed although very basic The rest of the facilities bedrooms halls and lobby area haven t and need it Wifi constantly cut out if you were able to connect Minibar in rooms didn t even have a bottle of water just 3 cans of some odd sodas that maybe the previous guests had left Luckily there s a Monoprix not far from the hotel Too much perfume potpourri being sprayed into lobby area
Positive_Review: The staff at reception were very nice and helpful Think they do everything from delivering an extra towel attempting to plunge our stopped up sink never drained properly still to helping us get our bags to the car down the street Champagne coffee macarons nougat in the lobby were a bonus Location is the main positive point Public pay parking lot at the end of the next street was great very clean secure and excellent location

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: What we loved about this cozy hotel The excellent location Latin Quarter close to the restaurants public transportation stores etc Coffee Nespresso and macaroons all day and delicious pastry and champagne from 5pm Great staff very helpful and polite

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: The rooms are small but this is Paris
Positive_Review: Small but comfortable rooms in a great location The champagne in the lobby in the afternoons was a nice touch

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Small room but I imagine this is common to most inner city hotel rooms
Positive_Review: Friendly helpful staff Location Happy time 5p 8p Access to mobile wifi for 1 per day

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: The staff never called for our airport shuttle although we asked four times By luck we ended up getting one on the morning we were leaving with their alert assistance The Internet service in room was very poor Other than that it was a lovely stay
Positive_Review: The location is excellent the lobby a fine place to lounge the staff very friendly and accommodating Just one slip up see other comment

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Very small rooms to be expected for location Close to other rooms
Positive_Review: Location was great close to Notre dame lots of restaurants and shops Close convenient location for tourists Staff friendly 24 hrs cleaning staff lovely Would stay again

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Good breakfast Excellent to have coffee tea making facilities in room What a treat to have complimentary champagne every evening Would definitely stay there again

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: There was a slight bad smell in the bathroom which has no ventilation and the wireless connection had to be setup user and password each time you open your cell phone which was quite annoying Also the mattress wasn t so comfortable
Positive_Review: A great hotel in an excellent location with special atmosphere created by beautiful lobby friendly staff and small gestures such as free espresso and macaroons as well as wine in the afternoon happy hour along with additional special sweets

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Bed was hard rooms were slightly small but to be expected in Paris Try to take a room away from the lift as it can be a bit noisy when the door opens and closes Wish the AC was cooling as a few nights it was slightly warm and it got a bit noisy when the window was open
Positive_Review: Location was amazing we walked all over the place plus loads of cafes and supermarkets around the hotel wifi strength was good staff were super nice breakfast was good and fresh I only wish they had an egg station The complementary nespresso and macarons was a nice touch

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: The rooms could do with a slight bit of modernization Bathroom facilities are fine just the bedroom area even just new style duvets pillows
Positive_Review: The staff was surprisingly well located In a nice quaint area of St Germain The rooms are a bit dated but still very nice a decent size for the price The hotel granted my request of a balcony had fresh macaroons at the front desk which were a nice touch Most things are within walking distance I would stay again

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: Not applicable
Positive_Review: Top marks for location cleanliness comfort and attentive staff stayed 3 nights with teenage daughter in interconnecting rooms which were ideal for us In our opinion a lovely well cared for hotel we plan to return when back in Paris Thank you

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: The walls of the hotel are thin and you can hear the neighbors
Positive_Review: The hotel has thought of everything you could need As a business traveler having a kettle and fridge in the rooms is very helpful The manager and hotel staff are friendly and helpful I would stay again

Hotel_Name: H tel Belloy Saint Germain By Happyculture
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Being upgraded without asking and the room was amazing beautifully clean great decor and looking out over two street views was superb The complementary champagne in the evenings and the deliciously fresh macaroons at reception were special Excellent customer service and attention from all the front of house staff We will definitely stay here on future trips to Paris
